dc_title_s: Pedestrian Counts At Intersection Screen Lines: Hennepin County, Minnesota
dc_description_s: This data shows the location of intersection screen lines used to count bicycle and pedestrian traffic. There are two screen lines at each intersection. In order to capture pedestrian and bicycle traffic in both directions, volunteers count the number of pedestrians and bicyclists that cross each screen line. Screen lines are linked to intersections by a count location ID Link to Attribute Table Information: http://gis.hennepin.us/OpenData/Metadata/PedestrianCountScreenLines.pdf Data updated: annually This data (i) is furnished AS IS with no representation as to completeness or accuracy; (ii) is furnished with no warranty of any kind; and (iii) is not suitable for legal, engineering or surveying purposes. Hennepin County shall not be liable for any damage, injury or loss resulting from this data. General questions about this data set, including errors, omissions, corrections and/or updates should be directed to the Hennepin County GIS Office at 612-596-9484.
